bug.author: adrianeboyd
bug.summary: Token pattern schema doesn't include all token attributes
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>import spacy from spacy.matcher import Matcher
nlp = spacy.load('en') matcher = Matcher(nlp.vocab) pattern = [{"IS_SENT_START": True}] matcher.add("TEST", None, pattern) </denchmark-code>
Output: <denchmark-code>ValueError: [E152] The attribute IS_SENT_START is not supported for token patterns. Please use the option validate=True with Matcher, PhraseMatcher, or EntityRuler for more details. </denchmark-code>
What's the best way to get a list of all the supported attributes to add to the schema? <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Current master with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/pull/4105>#4105</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: With the new non-validation filtering, people won't be able to add existing good patterns unless this list is complete.
